content: the hydrate h2o carrier is handy for kids at school hiking teachers really anyone it is important to keep hydrated in hot weather and what better way to keep your bottle handy there are instructions to make this bottle adjustable for 2 5 inch to 3 5 inch base and from 4 inch to 8 inch high if you have a specific pattern question please pop on over to my ravelry group buttonnose crochet community /groups/buttonnose-crochet-community this pattern is the property of buttonnose crochet please do not sell this pattern as your own or make videos without my consent you can sell your finished product but please give credit to me as the designer when possible
